title: Strengthening Instructional Design Practical Competencies: Auscultation Skills Training Course Based on Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Basic human anatomy and physiology knowledge, and basic stethoscope usage skills
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners distinguish three common heart sounds (normal, systolic murmur, diastolic murmur) with 90% accuracy.
Learners identify and document two respiratory sounds (normal breath sounds, wheezing) with 85% accuracy.
Learners systematically analyze complex auscultation cases using cognitive load management strategies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
